verses.text:
WITH our ears we this night appear,
And bow before the Lord ;
His high commands with reverence hear,
And tremble at his word.

How terrible thy glories are !
How bright thy beauties shine !
We are too foul for thee so fair,
Or truth compared with thine !

Still, all ye ransomed of the Lord,
Your great Deliverer sing ;
Yea, let his praise fill every word,
Be joyful in your King.

O Jesus, Lord of earth and heaven,
Our life and joy, to thee
Do we lift up our souls, by grace given
Through all eternity.
